PAGE_CONTENT: Lost City | Tayrona Park | Punto Gallinas | Minca | Sierra Nevada | La Guajira Peninsula. Explore Colombia at its best with Explotur-eco.

terms-conditions.title: Terms of services
terms-conditions.link-register: By registering you agree and accept our
terms-conditions.intro-content: These terms and conditions of use (Terms) apply to and govern the use of this Website (the “Website”), as well as the use of all the information and services provided from same Website. With regard to the access and use of the Website, it is deemed that the user has read and accepted the Terms. Should the user not accept or disagree with the Terms, he/she must not use the pages of the Website. The use of the Website and of each page of it, constitutes an irrebuttable presumption that the user has accepted and agreed to all the Terms unchanged. Magic Tour Colombia, as the administrator of the Website, may at any time and at its discretion amend the Terms of Use or set other ones more special, which shall prevail over any general rule, in case of conflict, and update the respective sections of the Website. Use of the Website by the users following their being informed on the applicable Terms of Use, implies their acceptance.
terms-conditions.para1-content:
1.1. The Terms and conditions set in this Website and in all of its functions, as well as any national, European or international legislation which concerns or relates to the Internet or the Web in general, bind all the users of this Website.
1.2. While accessing the Website users are obliged to comply with the Terms and all applicable law, as well as with the regulations and/ or the codes and/or the practices instituted and/ or applied by Magic Tour Colombia.
1.3. The users of the Website do not incur charges for the use of the Website in accordance with these Terms. However, the Website provides links to third party websites, which operate and are under the control of independent service providers or merchants/vendors. It is very likely that these third parties charge a fee for the use of specific content or services provided through the site. Therefore, the users should conduct any research they think as necessary or appropriate before making any transaction with any third party, in order to ascertain if there will be a charge. When Magic Tour Colombia provides information with regard to charges on the Website, such information is provided solely for convenience and for information purposes. Magic Tour Colombia in no way guarantees that this information is accurate nor is responsible in any way for content or services provided by such third party websites.
1.4. With the exception of the content users send, the content and the information of this Website (including, but not limited to, messages, data, information, text, music, sound, photographs, graphics, videos, maps, images, software, codes or other material), as well as the infrastructure used to provide such content and information, belongs to Magic Tour Colombia. Users agree not to modify in any other way, not to copy, distribute, transmit, display, perform, reproduce, publish, give license, or create derivative works, not to pass on, or sell or re-sell ant information, software, products or services obtained from or through this Website. Furthermore, they agree not to:
(i) use this Website or its content for any commercial purpose,
(ii) obtain access, monitor or copy ant content or information of this Website using any automated means or any manual process for any purpose without the express written permission of Magic Tour Colombia.
(iii) violate any limitations or restrictions that may exist in this Website or bypass or circumvent other measures taken for the prevention or limitation of access in this Website
(iv) make any action that imposes or may impose, in the discretion of Magic Tour Colombia, an unreasonable or disproportionately large load in its infrastructure
(v) set deep-links in any part of this Website for any purpose without the express written permission of Magic Tour Colombia or exhibit in a frame, as a mirror, or otherwise incorporate any part of this Website in any other site without prior written consent of Magic Tour Colombia
(vi) attempt to modify, translate, adapt, edit, decompile, disassemble or reverse development in any software programs used by Magic Tour Colombia in relation to the Website or its features or the services thereof.
1.5. In any case, users acknowledge and accept, without any reservation, that they are solely responsible for any loss or damage suffered by the Website and by third parties, regardless or the specific cause, the form and the name of any such, resulting, directly or indirectly, from the breach of any term of the present.
terms-conditions.para2-content: 2.1. Magic Tour Colombia believes in protecting the privacy of users of this Website. Any personal information posted on the Website by users shall be used in accordance with Data Privacy policy of Magic Tour Colombia.
terms-conditions.para3-content:
3.1. In any section or part of this Website where users may be asked to reveal personal and other information and data, users must register their real personal and other information and data.
3.2. In the Website, all necessary for the safety of communications measures are taken, in accordance with the applicable legislation.
terms-conditions.para4-content:
4.1. Magic Tour Colombia makes every effort to ensure that the content and the information which appear each time in this Website is as accurate and true as possible. Anything that may be provided in the form of an advertisement to users through this Website, is not, by any means, directly or indirectly, encouragement, advice or inducement to the performance of any action, thus it is at the discretion of the user to evaluate what it is provided to them and to act based on their own will, as any liability of Magic Tour Colombia is excluded.
4.2. Unless otherwise specified, the software on which the creation of this Website was based, as well as all content, including pictures, graphics, photographs, videos, designs, texts and all files of this Website, constitute intellectual property, registered trademarks and marks for services and products of Magic Tour Colombia and are being protected by the relevant provisions of Colombian law and by international conventions applicable for the protection of industrial and intellectual property.
4.3. Therefore, all the above, are provided to the user solely for personal and noncommercial use, and provided that all notes on the original material which are related to copyright and intellectual property, are kept in all copies of this material, and it is prohibited to modify the material in any way, or reproduce it or publicly display it, or perform it or load it or distribute it or use it in any other way, for commercial or other purposes. It is prohibited to modify, rent, lease, loan, sell, distribute or create derivative works, in whole or in part, unless it is specifically permitted by Magic Tour Colombia, in writing and with a separate agreement.
4.4. Each user accepts, explicitly and without any reservation, that he/she is solely responsible for any intervention on the content and for the consequences of any such, including any loss or damage of any type and any kind, that Magic Tour Colombia may suffer, while Magic Tour Colombia bears no responsibility towards either a user or a third party.
4.5. It is also mutually agreed and understood that, even though the Website provides users with the necessary technological infrastructure and the tools for posting/ publishing content, all the information and all content, whether publicly posted or privately transmitted, remains the sole responsibility of the person or the legal entity such content comes from. This means that the user is solely responsible for any and all content he/she posts, publish, send, transfers or otherwise makes available through the services of the Website. In the event that Magic Tour Colombia is notified that any content causes material or other damage to a third party, it reserves the right to immediately delete such content and simultaneously suspend the account, if such exists, of the member that violates the Terms of this Website.
4.6. The content and information contained in this Website and which do not belong to those which are intellectual property of Magic Tour Colombia, constitute an offer to the visitor/user and in general to the community of Internet users and shall not in any case be regarded as valid information or/ and advice nor conceal in any case an inducement to attempt or not certain acts. Magic Tour Colombia undertakes to collect, process and distribute the Website’s content, but in no case does it guarantee its integrity, completeness, adequacy and in general its appropriateness and the absence of errors, especially in consideration to its large volume, as well as to the participation of third parties (persons or legal entities) in its production and collection. Therefore, the users of the Website, when using the services of the Website on their own initiative, they also undertake the responsibility to verify the information provided.
terms-conditions.para5-content:
5.1. Magic Tour Colombia, its affiliates as well as its partners, do not make any representations of any kind with regard to the adequacy of the information, the software, the products and the services contained in this Website or any section thereof for any reason or purpose. All such information, software, products and services are provided “as it is” without warranty of any kind.
5.2. Magic Tour Colombia bears no responsibility for the communication of the user with third parties – service providers advertised in this Website as well as for any commercial transaction that may arise from the relationship between them.
5.3. Unless otherwise expressly provided in these Terms or any additional such, Magic Tour Colombia is not bound on the services, either in terms of their content, or function, or liability or availability, or in terms of capacity with regard to the satisfaction of the visitors – users’ needs.
5.4. These Terms and the Disclaimer above, do not affect legal rights provided by mandatory provisions that may not be excluded under applicable law.
terms-conditions.para6-content: 6.1. The Website may contain references via links, hyperlinks or advertising banners to third party sites. These are provided solely for the reference of the users of the Website. Magic Tour Colombia does not control and is not liable for their availability, their contents, their privacy policy – protection of the users’ personal data- or other practices. Further, it is on users to take precautions to ensure that any links they choose or any software they download (either form the Website or by other sites) are free of such items as viruses, worms, trojan horses, defects and other items of content that may cause damages. So, for any problem that may arise during the visit-use of such links, the user must address directly to the respective websites and web pages, which bear the entire responsibility for the provision of their services. Magic Tour Colombia may, no way, be considered to endorse or approve the content or the services of the websites and webpages referred to or linked in any other way.
terms-conditions.para7-content:
7.1. The Terms constitute the entire legal agreement between the visitor – user and Magic Tour Colombia and govern the use of the Website by the user.
7.2. The user expressly and unconditionally accepts that Magic Tour Colombia may provide notices, including such that may relate to modification of the Terms, through e-mails, mail or announcements.
7.3. Any delay or failure to exercise any right of Magic Tour Colombia, either once or repeatedly, shall be no way deemed as waiver of such right that may be exercised at any time.
7.4. Should a provision of these Terms be invalid, the user expressly and unconditionally accepts that said term shall be replaced by Magic Tour Colombia with another of an equivalent effect, thus interpreting the actual will of the contracting parties. In any case, the remaining Terms hereof are not affected by the invalidity of any term and remain valid and in force.
7.5. In case of breach by the user of any Term hereof, in addition to the consequences provided herein or in any other source of law, Magic Tour Colombia has the right, at its absolute discretion, to discontinue, temporarily or permanently the ability to access the Website.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.intro-content: This Privacy Policy – Policy for the Protection of Personal Data is a part of the Terms of Use of this Website and regulates the management and protection of personal data of any user, always combined with the provisions of national and international law with regard to the protection of individuals from the processing of personal data, as in force.
privacy-policy.intro-content1:
Each user may browse the Website without providing any personal information or data. Magic Tour Colombia collects personal data of the users of the Website only when they voluntarily provide them in order to receive the services which are available on line and where requested. Personal data are data that can be used to determine the identity or communicating with a person as well as other information related to same person. Personal data that may be collected on this Website may include, without limitation, the following:
• Full name
• Identity number
• Occupation
• Address and phone number
• Email address.

Magic Tour Colombia shall not make available for sale or otherwise transmit or disclose personal data of the users of this Website to third parties, not related to it, without the user’s consent. Exceptionally, Magic Tour Colombia may disclose personal data of the users of the Website in the following cases: When it has obtained the explicit consent of the user for the disclosure, in any way, of their personal data. When the disclosure is made to third individuals or legal entities with which it Magic Tour Colombia cooperates and strictly and only to the extent necessary for the provision of a service of this Website. If and when required by law, by a court decision or if and when requested by any other government or regulatory authority. Magic Tour Colombia may process part of all the information sent by users for statistical reasons and to improve the services – information provided in this Website. The user may contact the administrator of the Website to check for the existence of his/her personal file, to correct it, to change it or delete it, at webmaster@magictourcolombia. In this e-mail address the user can also report any unlawful use of his/her personal data.
privacy-policy.para1-content:
Magic Tour Colombia may obtain data of identification of the users of the Website, by using relevant technologies, such as cookies or/and monitoring Internet Protocol (IP) addresses. Cookies are small text files stored on the hard drive of the user thus do not access any document or file of the computer. They are used to facilitate user’s access to specific services or/ and pages of the Website, for statistical purposes and to determine the areas which are useful or popular. These data may also include the type of browser used by the user, the type of computer, its operating system, the internet service provider and other such information. Additionally, the information system of the Website automatically collects information related to the sites its user visits and to the links on third party websites that the user may select through the use of the Website. Cookies are used for the following reasons, such as:
• To provide users with access to their personal services, through entry into their account (login)
• To provide personalized services to the users.
• To record general data of the Website’s traffic.
• To conduct research, for the improvement of the content and of the services as well as for facilitating the user’s access to specific services of the Website.
• For the smooth operation of the services and of the pages of the Website.
• To display information to users based on their interests and activities that they may have indicated during their registration.
The user of the Website may set the program for surfing the Internet (web browser) so as to be warned on the use of cookies on specific services or to prevent the acceptance of cookies in any case. Should the user of these services not wish the use of cookies for his/her identification, the user cannot have any further access to such services.
privacy-policy.para2-content: This Website contains links to other websites which are under the responsibility of third parties (individuals or legal entities). Under no circumstances is Magic Tour Colombia liable for the terms of protection of personal data these websites follow. Each user understands,  acknowledges and agrees that these links are provided solely for the user’s convenience only and do not imply Magic Tour Colombia acceptance of their content and of the advertising or business practices of any third parties. Magic Tour Colombia is not liable for any privacy policy or content of any such website,  including sites which indicate a special relationship or “partnership” with Magic Tour Colombia. Magic Tour Colombia does not disclose the unique identification data to the administrators of these websites for which there is a link. These websites however,  may collect personal data when users visit them. This collection of information is not in Magic Tour Colombia control. To ensure privacy protection,  users must always check the privacy policies of the websites they visit and are provided as links on this Website.
privacy-policy.para3-content: Magic Tour Colombia,  as the Admistrator of this Website,  always reserves the right to update this Privacy Policy,  in accordance with the applicable legal framework. Therefore,  this Policy may be revised at any time and without notice. Users should periodically check the Privacy Policy of the Website,  as its continuous use implies that the user accepts any amendments thereto,  and therefore,  the collection,  use,  disclosure,  management and storage of the users’ Personal Data as described in this Policy,  as in force.

PlaceHolder.Name: Enter FullName
PlaceHolder.YourEmail: email address we will reply to
PlaceHolder.FromAirport: From the Santa Marta terminal, take a cab until our office door.
PlaceHolder.ByBusSantaMarta: Take a local bus (buseta) toward the center. Get off on the 5th at the Cathedral. Our office faces it on your right hand side.
PlaceHolder.ByFootSantaMarta: From the beach (bahia), make a right turn on 14th street. Our office is located 4 blocks further on left hand side(in front of the cathedral).
PlaceHolder.ByBusTaganga: Catch the bus going Taganga from Santa Marta. Get off on 16th st (calle 16). Our office is a one minute walking distance from there on your right hand side.
PlaceHolder.ByFootTaganga: In Taganga, from the beach, make a left turn on 16th street (calle 16). Our office is located on left hand side, 1/2 block.
PlaceHolder.VeggieLoremIpsum: Veggies es bonus vobis, proinde vos postulo essum magis kohlrabi welsh onion daikon amaranth tatsoi tomatillo melon azuki bean garlic. Gumbo beet greens corn soko endive gumbo gourd. Parsley shallot courgette tatsoi pea sprouts fava bean collard greens dandelion okra wakame tomato. Dandelion cucumber earthnut pea peanut soko zucchini.
PlaceHolder.TourSummaryLoremIpsum: Magic Tour Colombia offers private tours and group excursions.
PlaceHolder.DiffLevel: This activity is selectable to everyone.
PlaceHolder.TourDescriptionMTC: Best unforgettable small-group travel experiences in Colombia for all destinations offered by Magic Tour Colombia.
PlaceHolder.Tips: Magic Tour Colombia and a handful of his adventurous friends share the latest tips, expert reviews, the best travel experiences, and more. At any time, you can get in touch with us. Send us a message or comments and a representative will assist you in your requests.

Content.ParaCategoryFilter:
Narrow down your tours selection using the Category filter. Display only tours that include your prefered categories.

By default all categories are selected. Use the Dropdown button to see the categories list.
Content.ParaDifficultyLevelFilter:
Narrow down even more your tour selection with the difficulty level that fit your fitness.

By default all difficulty levels are selected. Use the Dropdown button to see the difficulty levels list.

about.title: Magic Tour Colombia's dynamic
about.subtitle: A winning team that focuses on customer satisfaction
about.intro: Magic Tour Colombia developed its own way to travel: small groups, contact with the populations visited, use of local human resources in the interests of fairness, organization of tourist attractions and especially the implementation of packages, tours and expeditions at the traveler's request.
about.story-content: Magic Tour Colombia was founded in 2005 at Santa Marta, Colombia. Our primary focus is to organize excursions and adventure tours in Tayrona Park, la Sierra Nevada (Lost City) and La Guajira.
about.mission-content: To be recognized as a leading tour operator in the development and realization of sustainable tourism at national and international levels.
about.community-content: At Magic Tour Colombia, we put the extra efforts to keep a close and continuous collaboration with the local and indigenous communities with principles of respect and sustainability. Magic Tour Colombia is proud to contribute to the local area development projects.
about.progress-content: Currently, Magic Tour Colombia is considered the tour operator number one for the Lost City Tour, in terms of quality and customer service. Magic Tour Colombia also operates exclusive tours in the department of La Guajira ( Palomino, Cabo de la Vela and Punta Gallinas ).
about.team-content: A winning team that focuses on customer satisfaction. To make a success of those tours, we use the necessary infrastructures and the suitable human ressources to keep everybody happy.

section-3.title: True real Holidays
section-3.subtitle: Travel to your taste and rhythm
